content: Project FalconWing: next-gen supersonic jet prototype, composite fuselage, advanced airflow design.
metadata: Launched: 2025-01-10, design lead: Alice Brown (AERO-1001), budget: $500M

content: Project EcoLiner: ultra-fuel-efficient airliner, new winglet concept, hybrid electric propulsion test.
metadata: Started: 2025-02-05, manager: Bob Chen (AERO-2001), aim: 20% fuel savings

content: Project VTOLX: vertical takeoff passenger craft, tilt-rotor mechanism, urban air mobility focus.
metadata: Initiated: 2025-03-01, lead: Carol Lim (AERO-3002), capacity: 5 passengers

content: Project HeavyHaul: large cargo plane with forward-loading nose, increased payload capacity.
metadata: Launched: 2025-02-20, chief engineer: David Parker (AERO-4001), target 80-ton load

content: Project StratoScan: high-altitude reconnaissance UAV, solar panels for extended endurance.
metadata: Commenced: 2025-03-15, lead: Emily Stone (AERO-5001), flight ceiling ~70k ft
